attributes.action: Remove innocent people's details from the Crimint Database.
attributes.additional_details: The crimint database holds details of people whom have never been arrested or convicted of any crime, once on the database then it can accessed by employers, councils through the freedom of information and possibly very damaging. Also, it breaches human rights.  We would like the government to order the removal of all innocent people's names from the database.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter
